signIn.description: Control show or hide a sign-in button to uniweb.

joinMenus.description: Control the navbar to replace the auto-generated nav link with the docufolio link or merge them together, true for merge, false for replace.

extraMenu.description: If given, the nav links from docufolio will be put inside a dropdown menu with the given name as the trigger label, leaving it empty means the nav links will be placed after the auto-generated nav links.
